description: This file defines a Frontend UI component named 'Home' using the Blits framework. It imports components, sets up a visual template with animations and transitions, and includes methods for UI behavior such as rotating colors and managing animations on component lifecycle hooks.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Blits component representing the home page UI, with animated logo, loader, text, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to cycle through a predefined array of colors at specified intervals.
